name: Imslogic
short_description: IMSLogic is an Institute Management Software is fully loaded, web-based Software. It is simple and very user friendly software which is designed as a complete suite of all features and modules. That makes it most versatile educational software you can have for small, medium and large institutes/coaching centres.  IMSLogic gives a cutting-edge performance and solves the most complex tasks. Also it fulfils the entire administrative and academic requirements in real time. IMSLogic give comprehensive dashboard that provides complete control that allows you to keep a track of inside out activities and vital information and pushes the staff to execute their work on time and in proper manner. The main features of IMSLogic includes, Course Management, Batch Management, Student Management, Faculty Management, Fees Management, Branch Management, User Management, HRMS, Payroll, Inventory Management & all reports with export options etc.
summary: Easy to manage your institute with simple solution. - IMSLOGIC
